New Records: Juan Soto hit a 402-foot no-doubter into the right-field bleachers
Key Match Events: Juan Soto remained in the game after a midgame injury scare and hit a walk-off home run
The game went into extras and the bottom of the 11th inning after Yankees reliever Luke Weaver pitched 1 2/3 scoreless innings
The Yankees won 4-3 on an infield single by Jazz Chisholm
Pre-Game Insights: Aaron Judge is 11-for-53 in his past 15 games with zero home runs
Soto entered Wednesday's game in an 11-for-52 slump of his own
The Yankees haven’t played up to their standards for the past few weeks
Post-Match Reflections: The win extended the club’s lead to 1 1/2 games in the American League East
Chisholm acknowledged that the game felt like a playoff game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees will host the Red Sox for a four-game series beginning Thursday night
The Boston Red Sox walked off the Baltimore Orioles just minutes before New York’s win
